column4: I think you might have better success if you add it as a launcher on the panel
hmm, ok. I don't really want to though. But I'll check. So no way to do that with a desktop script?
yes it is indeed a shell script. I fixed it by moving the scripts to ~/bin and then creating launchers on the desktop with the command 'gnome-terminal -e "~/bin/shellscript.sh"'
